skillTree.localised_description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.
The same enchanted mist that obscures Fimir Balefiend dwellings can also be conjured to confound and horrify would-be attackers on the battlefield.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Fimir likes to play an instrument known to the mist-daemons as "Bogpipe", melodious to the Fimir, but horrendously cacophonic to other races.
This Fimir practises Brollaidheacht, a form of wrestling popular with all castes where two Fimir will try to push one another outside of a sacred circle. The first to go out of the circle loses.
This Fimir has taken the Daemon Prince Lisaart the Serpent, Master of Camouflage and cunning trickster as their chosen patron deity.

effects.description:
Hero action success chance: +10%
	(Heroes in local region)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Fimir has taken the Daemon Prince Balor, Master of Battle and warrior of great prowess, as their chosen patron deity.
This Fimir has taken the Daemon Prince Kroll, Mistress of Plenty and guardian of the bogs, as their chosen patron deity.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 when in own territory
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This character is known as a "Flaithmor", a Fimm renowned for his skill in duelling and killing enemy champions. They command huge respect amongst the rest of the Fimm Caste.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -20% for Fimm Warriors and Fianna Fimm units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Fimm delights in enslaving other beings, be them Fimir or non-Fimir, cruelly pushing them to work and fight harder.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Shearls, Shearl Scouts, and Fimm Deathquests units
	(all units in army)

Slaves gained from battles: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Fimir is known for having a knack in telling the many stories, legends and songs of their race to inspire fellow Fimir. From the tale of the great war against the Human tribe of the Jutones to grandiose tales about the lost Fimir homeland of the Wandering Isle.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
